description: Retrieves the pre-signed Amazon S3 download URL corresponding to an image layer. You can only get URLs for image layers that are referenced in an image. When an image is pulled, the GetDownloadUrlForLayer API is called once per image layer that is not already cached.

parameters.name: repositoryName
parameters.description: The name of the repository that is associated with the image layer to download.

parameters.name: layerDigest
parameters.description: The digest of the image layer to download.

nested_items.name: downloadUrl
nested_items.description: The pre-signed Amazon S3 download URL for the requested layer.

nested_items.name: layerDigest
nested_items.description: The digest of the image layer to download.
